item.description: a libyan government spokesman on thursday confirmed that foreign minister moussa koussa had resigned but said he did not know of any other official who had resigned or left the country.

item.title: bp to provide $1 billion for oil spill projects

item.description: officials this week arrested a brooklyn vendor suspected of importing the illegal snakehead fish, a rapidly reproducing predator with such a voracious appetite it can wipe out entire schools of fish and destroy an ecosystem.

item.description: a u.s. appeals court on wednesday left in place a ban on gay marriage in california, denying requests to allow same-sex weddings during a lengthy appeals process.
